article.title: Northrop Awarded Advanced Hawkeye Funds
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corp., Bethpage, New York, is being awarded $8,258,253 for ceiling priced delivery order 7252 under a previously awarded basic ordering agreement (N00383-12-G-034G) for the repair of 51 line items for the Advanced Hawkeye system used on the E-2D aircraft.Â The Naval Supply Systems Command Weapons System Support, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
